name: Eye Parlor: Eye Makeup Games
description:
Eye Parlor: Eye Makeup Game is latest beautification and designing game, where you can enjoy many amazing eye art styles. Pick the style you want to paint and impress everyone, with cool eye arts. Create imaginary eye art styles, with real coloring feelings. In Eye Parlor Game, you are the makeup games but eye parlor has its own feelings. Enjoy the beauty girl tasks for hours and totally FREE.

Every time you finish a gorgeous eye makeup, you will receive next more wonderful target to accomplish. So by this way your skills will be uncover in real life. Simulate eye designs with finger and paint color fill.

Eye Parlor offers you many of sparkly eye shadows for eye makeup styles, once you use Mascara brush, you will definitely love it. There are different tools for different and unique experience in each level. Enjoy the eyebrow pencil, eyeshadow brush, eyeliners and even realistic mascara. Makeup with multiple eye art tools just like in real life.

Features of Eye Parlor: Eye Makeup Games

- Free and easy to use eye styles game
- Available for everyone and anywhere
- Make free time wonderful
- Tens of levels and eye makeup designs
- Influencers to the Rescue
- Extra bonuses on task completion and welcome back
- Multiple custom makeup styles

We hope, you will like Eye Parlor – Eye Art & Makeup Games, if so then please share with friends and family to amaze them with wonderful free time coloring and art game. If you have any suggestions to improve eye parlor, then please let us know your feedback.
